episodes.title: Episode 166: The Kirtland Cult Killings
episodes.description: Cult leaders, with their charisma and allure, always wield a captivating influence over the individuals who become their devoted followers. These figures not only have the ability to deliver their ideologies in a way that unfolds gradually and increases with intensity over time but also their ability to fulfill the needs of those who seek purpose, belonging, or a sense of identity. In today’s episode we will take on such a case when discussing the crimes of Jeffrey Lundgren and the event that will become known as the Kirtland cult killings.   Patreon.com/truecrimecouple  Sponsors:  Skylight Frames: Get $15 off a Skylight Frame at Skylight Frame.com/COUPLE  Blissy: Get better sleep now with Blissy and use TCC to get an additional 30% off at blissy.com/TCC   Sources: https://archive.org/details/prophetofdeathmo00earl https://www.latimes.com/archives/la-xpm-1990-01-13-me-188-story.html https://www.news-herald.com/2014/12/30/kirtland-cult-killings-timeline-of-events/ https://www.news-herald.com/2014/12/30/kirtland-cult-killings-looking-back-at-lake-countys-worst-mass-murder-25-years-later/ https://www.blockparole.com/remembrance/dennis-becky-trina-karen-and-cheryl-avery/ Prophet of Death: The Mormon Blood Atonement Killings by Pete Earley (accessed through Kindle)

episodes.title: Episode 51 Part II: Larry Ray | The Kids Are Not Alright
episodes.description: In today's episode we will cover part two of the Sarah Lawrence Sex Cult scandal currently rocking the nation. Join us as we take a deep dive into who Larry Ray is and how he was able to manipulate some the brightest young minds of our country.     Our sponsors:     Vistaprint.com/TCC Wix.com/podcast  Best Fiends       Patreon.com/truecrimecouple

episodes.title: Episode 33: Killer Cult | The Ant Hill Kids
episodes.description: If I were to ask you to tell me the craziest cult you’d ever heard of you would probably tell me the Manson Family, Aum Shinrikyo, Children of God, or maybe Heaven’s Gate. But there is always a cult that is kept out of the conversation surrounding the damaging effects and dangers that these deadly cults pose. That would be the Ant Hill Kids. However, the members of this cult would not do harm unto others, harm would be done unto them at the hands of their charismatic leader.      patreon.com/truecrimecouple
